summary: This node handles Lemlist events via webhooks.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event to trigger the webhook. Choose from a list of predefined events such as 'Contacted', 'Hooked', 'Emails Sent', etc.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the webhook trigger.

parameters.name: campaign name or id
parameters.description: Specify a campaign ID to trigger the webhook only for this campaign. You can choose from the list or use an expression to specify an ID.

parameters.name: is first
parameters.description: Set to true to trigger the webhook only the first time this activity occurs.
